message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think will be of great value to you. I'm offering it for $12,000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position.  While I appreciate your offer,  I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. How about $11,000?  I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer. I'm willing to go up to $10,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob,  I appreciate you coming up on your offer.  I'm still hoping for a little more to make this deal work.  Let's meet in the middle at $10,750.  I'm confident you'll find this product to be a valuable asset.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to pay $10,600 for the product. This seems like a fair compromise given its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective.  To finalize this deal, I'm willing to accept $10,650. It's a fair compromise for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product. What do you say?
